chapterTitle: Financial Statements, Taxes, and Cash Flow

columns.text: In this problem, we are asked to determine the earnings per share and dividends per share of Griffin's Goat Farm, Inc.

Let's first define earnings per share and dividends per share.

- **Earnings per share** is the monetary value of earnings per outstanding share of common stock for a company.

- **Dividend per share** is the sum of declared dividends issued by the company per outstanding share of common stock.

### Earnings per share

The earnings per share is computed as follows:

$$\begin{aligned} 
\text{ EPS } &= \dfrac{\text{Net Income}}{\text{ Weighted Average Share Outstanding}}\\
\end{aligned}$$

Where:
EPS = Earnings per Share

Now before we compute for the Earnings per share, let's first compute for the Income Statement using the information in problem 2.


| Particulars | Amounts ($) | 
|--|--:| 
| Sales|796,000 | 
| Cost|327,000 | 
| Depreciation Expense |42,000 | 
| Interest Expense|34,000 |

Net Income is computed as follows: 

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Net Income} &= \text{Sales} - {\text{Expense}}\\[1pt]
\end{aligned}$$

As presented below,  after deducting all the expenses which comprise the cost of sales, depreciation, and interest expense, the net income will be as follows:


$$\def\arraystretch{1.2} 
\begin{array}{|c|} \hline
 \textbf{Griffin's Goat Farm, Inc.}\\
 \text{Income Statement}\\ 
\text{For the year ended December 31, 20XX}\\ 
\hline \begin{array}{l r r }\\ 
\text{Sales} & \$796,000 &\\ 
\text{Less: Cost of Goods Sold} & \underline{327,000} & \\ 
\textbf{Gross Profit} & \$469,000\\ \text{Less: Depreciation} & \underline{\quad42,000} &\\ 
\textbf{Earnings before interest and taxes} & \$427,000\\ 
\text{Less: Interest Expense} & \underline{34,000}\\ 
\textbf{Taxable income} & \$393,000\\ \text{Less: Income Tax Expense} & \underline{82,530}\\ 
\textbf{Net Income} & \underline{\underline{\mathbf{\$310,470}}}\\ \end{array}\\\\ \hline 
\end{array}$$

Now that we have computed the net income, let's now compute for the earning's per share using the equation in step 3.

$$\begin{aligned} 
\text{ EPS } &= \dfrac{\text{Net Income}}{\text{ Weighted Average Share Outstanding}}\\[10pt]
&= \dfrac{\text{\$310,470}}{\text{80,000 sh}}\\[10pt]
&= \boxed{\textbf{\$3.88 per share}}\\
\end{aligned}$$

Therefore, the earning's per share of Griffin’s Goat Farm, Inc. is **$3.88 per share**.

### Dividends per share

Dividends per share are computed as follows:

The dividends per share is computed as follows:

$$\begin{aligned} 
\text{ DPS } &= \dfrac{\text{Annual Dividends}}{\text{ Weighted Average Share Outstanding}}\\
\end{aligned}$$

Where:

DPS = Dividends per share

let's now compute for the dividend per share using the information in problem 3 and the equation in step 3.

$$\begin{aligned} 
\text{ DPS } &= \dfrac{\text{Annual Dividends}}{\text{ Weighted Average Share Outstanding}}\\[10pt]
&= \dfrac{\text{\$95,000}}{\text{80,000 sh}}\\[10pt]
&= \boxed{\textbf{\$1.19 per share}}\\
\end{aligned}$$

Therefore, the dividend per share of Griffin’s Goat Farm, Inc. is **$1.19 per share**.
